div1.p: Carter discusses his travel plans related to work in Virginia and his health.

div1.head: Letter from Henry Rose Carter to Laura Eugenia Hook Carter, July 11, 1917
div1.opener:
Murphy's
HOTEL
INCORPORATED.
European Plan.
JOHN MURPHY
PRESIDENT.
NEW AND ABSOLUTELY FIREPROOF
Richmond, Va.
July 11 1917
My Dear Laura:
div1.p:
I spent one day in Washing-
ton- A very fatiguing day of wrang-
ling but wrangling to a success-
ful result-; one day at Quan-
tico - completing the work which
I need personnally there, the
train was behind time - & we I
reached Fredricksburg at 6.P.M.
yesterday & caught the next
train - due at 6.54 - but which
2
was a half hour late, got into
R'd, at 9.4 9.30. Too strenuous
a day- However - we did what
we had to do, & that rests me.
I go to Petersburg tomorrow
- Address Hotel Petersburg as
before- with Griffitts: Hayne & a
man from the Va Board, to com-
plete the malaria survey there
I think we have Sunday: or
Monday-Tuesday at any rate
for Hampton Roads-Country
-exactly what address I do not
know yet. Letters however will
reach me in Petersburg up to
Sunday.

Murphy's
HOTEL
INCORPORATED.
European Plan.
JOHN MURPHY
PRESIDENT.

I am not going to press
myself as much as I have
been doing in the Quanti-
co work, can't stand it - althou
although I think my break-
down w/ last Saturday was
from worry as much as from
work.

I had to buy a hat, or
rather 2 hats, today, one for
wear & one for high wear-
4
both very decent price
$3.00 & $1 00/100. Had a card
from Braxton - saying that he
had delayed so long about
the suitcase that he wrote to
ask if I was still at Fredricks-
berg. I wrote him to hold it. I
will get it tomorrow & then
have room to stow my
f stuff.

Has there been any news
of my rain Cape?

Haven't quite recovered from
yesterdays fatigue but
will
5
Murphy's
HOTEL
INCORPORATED.
European Plan.
JOHN MURPHY
PRESIDENT.
NEW AND ABSOLUTELY FIREPROOF
Richmond, Va.
_____ 19___
tomorrow & am well.

Have not had a chance to see Hill
Tell Laura. I rad rode from
Balt. to Washington with Mr
McCormick - “Cookie” McCormick's
husband? He is well & prosperous
I did not ask after Mr McC. be-
cause I feared he might not
like to talk about her-

Also Dr. Bell called on me. He
6
is going to have change of the
naval station at the James-
town stati Exposition grounds,
HadFound, a note from Sally Carter's
father - both cordial & courteous - at
the Hotel. He had called - with the
intention of inviting me to
dinner.- Have just ans-
wered it. Found your own &
Laura's letters to me there also
read all on the train coming
over. Th

Love to all - I am glad I was in
Balt. Sunday - say you- & the Ir's.
